DOC.brief_summary: Validate circulate cell free fetal nucleic acid use identify direct marker fetal aneuploidy , particularly fetal Down Syndrome ( DS ) , good surrogate marker .
DOC.brief_title: Non-Invasive Screening Fetal Aneuploidy : A New Maternal Plasma Marker
DOC.criteria: Subject female Subject pregnant Subject high risk aneuploid patient undergoing genetic counseling , unltrasound screening , amniocentesis and/or CVS procedure Subject willing provide blood specimen Subject pregnant Subject willing provide blood specimen Subject have aneuploid screening
